ValidationRule.description: Requires the user to populate Customer Account field before saving a Contact record if the Account Name field is blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND($Profile.Name!='System Administrator', RecordType.DeveloperName !='ANI_ONLY', Account.Name =null ),ISBLANK( NS_CustomerAccnt__c ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Account Name that this Contact should be associated to when the Account becomes available in ConnectNS.
